title: Photos: UFC on ESPN+ 19 official weigh-ins, faceoffs
text:
Check out photos of the fighters on the scale and their faceoffs ahead of Saturday’s UFC on ESPN+ 19 event in Tampa, Fla. (Photos by Mike Bohn, USA TODAY Sports)
